title: The structural design shall comply with Indian Standard Codes of structural design for structural sa
clause_text: The structural design shall comply with Indian Standard Codes of structural design for structural safety, seismic safety and against cyclone/wind storms as listed below and as amended upto date: Indian Standard Code of Practice for Earthquake Resistant Design IS1893, IS4326 Indian Standard Seismic Code of Practice for Seismic Design IS1893(Part1):2002 Indian Standard Code of Practice for Wind Pressure (IS: 1875Part3- 1987) IS Code as would be made applicable by Bureau of Indian Standard from time to time

source_pdf.text_snippet: The structural design shall comply with Indian Standard Codes of structural design for structural safety, seismic safety and against cyclone/wind storms as listed below and as amended upto date:
